entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Missing disposed cancellation token registration after setting result on Rate Limiting #76783
  • CQ: Manually hoisted Vector{256,128} constant is reloaded inside the loop (sometimes) #76781
    8.0.0
  • Cannot hit breakpoint when Blazor wasm project path contains special characters #76777
  • CoreCLR failed to build with error Failed to retrieve information about 'Microsoft.DotNet.Arcade.Sdk' on MSVC #76776
  • Tracing for unmanaged library loading #76775
  • build libs with `/p:Deterministic=true` some libraray make diff #76774
  • Consolidate ilasm/main.cpp and ildasm/windasm.cpp #76773

Closed

  • The current Socket implementation is bad. Please fix it. #76785
  • [API Proposal]: ChannelWriter<T>.WriteAsync(Func<CancellationToken, ValueTask<T>, CancellationToken) #76281
  • Possible to detect AOT mode during runtime? #76739
  • Chrome debugger tests timeout #76750
    8.0.0
  • Bound checks for readonly byte arrays with byte indexer #13159
    Future
  • dotnet.wasm and other dll regenerated at each publish #73700
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Use metadata names for SIMD intrinsic method recognition #76786
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixe missing dispose on rate limiting #76784
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Use hashcodes when looking up the JsonSerializerOptions global cache. #76782
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix debugger behavior when the type has ToString method overwritten #76780
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix MetadataLoadContext Readme #76778
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Fix help formatting in cg2/ilc #76772
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Add RIDs for Tizen6.5 and 7.0 #76599
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • JIT: Streamline SIMD recognition #76613
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • enable regions for AoT #76737
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Throw ObjectDisposedException for AES-CCM on Android #76753
    area-System.Security, os-android

Updated

  • Clean up JIT<->EE "get class name" methods, support nested classes in method sets #76505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove more PAL exports for `wprintf` `wscanf` funcs #76771
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove libstdc++ dependency from NativeAOT #76705
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Vectorize (Last)IndexOfAny(Except) for ASCII needles #76740
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • SPMI: Return recorded base instrumentation data address #76765
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add non-generic Create method to DispatchProxy #73046
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution, Future
  • Test Only - Less aggressive instrumentation for Vector256 crash #76701
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure source generated metadata properties are read-only. #76540
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Devirtualize EqualityComparer for reference types #76714
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Fold full-width SIMD-typed indirections #76745
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Preference locals away from PUTARG_REG killed registers #76671
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use more spans in `System.Reflection.Metadata` et. al. #76574
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Require global opt-in for distributed transactions #76376
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Transactions, new-api-needs-documentation, linkable-framework, 7.0.0
  • Only R2R public methods, methods that override public methods, and internal methods that aren't always inlined #75793
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Correct error messages for CoreCLR Win32 PAL uses in CoreLib #76768
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fold primitive-typed access to promoted structs in local morph and forbid mismatched struct assignments #76766
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Support network status information #71941
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • source-build: support building runtime using non-portable runtime packages. #75597
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Fix an issue with deopt and interpreter tiering. #76743
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Improvements to CoreCLR Building, Debugging, and Testing Documentation #75569
    documentation, area-Meta
  • JIT: import static readonly fields holding frozen objects as const handles #76112
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve perf of Enumerable.Order{Descending} for primitives #76733
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Don't check handles in substitution #76730
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable visual styles for host error dialog via activation context #76762
    area-Host
  • [wasm-mt] When workers resize the heap, instanceof SharedArrayBuffer may be false #76760
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Add debugger display for huge BigInteger #75796
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • ActivatorUtilities not depending on ctor order for creating instances #75846
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [JIT] Cleanup to lsra inspired by #73424 #76481
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-08
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • dotnet-cli segfault on Gentoo #28311

Updated

  • [NetSDKE2E][Loc]With version17.4.0 preview 3.0 + .net7 rc2 SDK installed on locale OS, some template names are unlocalized after running "dotnet new --list" in CLI . #28068

PullRequests

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28398
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28397
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add PackageDependenciesDesignTime to cache assets file #28405
  • ResolveReadyToRunCompilers: map non-portable rids when targetOS is determined. #28380
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make Apps RID Specific By Default & RID Now FDD By Default in 8.0+ #28376
    Review for breaking changes

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RoslynDeployment on main branch isn't usable #64587
  • No type completion after `required` modifier #64585

Closed

  • Allocate blittable object on stack memory #64589
  • Magical semi-colon teleportation in Visual Studio #64577
  • False positive CS8602 warning #64525

PullRequests

Created

  • "Generate method" codefix supports 'in' parameters #64588
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Try add committed Suggestion item to completion MRU #64586
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64584
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #64591
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #64590
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove Duplicate Custom UI Visualizer Attributes from CLR Types #57828
    Area-Compilers
  • Check value scopes match in ref reassignment #64561
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Catch deconstruction ref escape errors in invocation escape analysis #64470
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Filter only valid symbols for inheritance completions #62013
    Area-IDE, Community
  • [LSP] Fix race during shutdown and exit #64583
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Use IAsyncEnumerable in NavigateTo OOP calls. #64576
    Area-IDE
  • Update NavigateTo tests to support AllInOneSearch #64582
    Area-IDE
  • Build and run tests on .NET 7 #64560
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable rich LSIF hover information. #64580
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Results' methods have invalid XML documentation #44428
  • Refreshing Cookie Authentication Cookie Issue with HttpClient Causes Weird Caching Issue #44427
  • Fine-grained override of `OAuthHandler.HandleRemoteAuthenticateAsync` #44424

Closed

  • Blazor inserted HTML comment tags cause layout issues #44404
  • Override `ToString` on the `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.CookieOptions` class. #44401
  • BlazorServer TokenProvider returns null in MessageHandler #33837
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixing XML documentation issues for Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Results' methods #44429
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Experiment with named pipes transport #44426
    area-runtime

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2015282 #43956
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Update bind:set,after runtime apis #44412
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor
  • [AuthZ] Add IRequirementData #44342
    area-security
  • Avoid double dispatch by default on HTTP.sys #44409
    Perf, area-runtime
  • Update documentation for default CookieBuilder options #44290
    Docs, area-security
  • Add schema in launchSettings.json files #44295
    area-mvc
  • StringUtilities with xplat-intrinsics (and a little perf-tuning) #44040
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • BindingList-BindableLayout not updating #10570
  • Icon for Android or iOS #10569
  • [Android] When using StackLayout with HorizontalOptions="Center" within Scrollview causes labels/buttons to be truncated #10568
  • Permissions.CheckStatusAsync<LocationWhenInUse> calls OnAppearing when Denied and not invoking permission prompt #10566
  • InvalidateMeasure() not work at windows #10565
  • Windows Unpackaged support in MAUI #10564

Closed

  • Essentials Permissions.ShouldShowRationale<Permissions.LocationWhenInUse> never returns true on Android 12 #10551
  • nothing #10559
  • iOS Splash background color is wrong #9405

PullRequests

Created

  • Validate authenticity of compatibility renderer #10567
  • Update ContextFlyout sample to show more scenarios #10563
    area/desktop 🖥️, control-contextmenu

Merged

  • Change storyboard color space #10549
  • [Tizen] Fixes Tizen SemanticScreenReader using a new Accessibility API #10511
    area/a11y, community ✨

Updated

  • Don't fire appearing/disappearing with window #10530
    area/lifecycle 🔁
  • [Housekeeping] Including "real apps samples" in the Gallery #10544
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Added Tag to map pin #10446
    community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10532
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When using UNION with owned entity types a LEFT JOIN to same table is generated #29300
  • Add support for validating data and reporting problems during data migrations #29299
  • The naming convention of custom foreign keys and shadow attributes conflicts. Types that can be null cannot be null during migration #29298
  • Seeding issue with JSON columns in EF Core 7 #29297
